text: Trump, Jared Kushner, & his shadow task force of corporate cronies shouldn’t be making COVID-19 policy decisions that line their pockets. It's obscene that the Trump family & those close to them still won’t put the country’s interests before their own. https://t.co/HQEypzvBux
